author: jleroux
msg: Related to https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4332  "Pagination in find order screen doesn't work (With patch)" but not the real issue which is only for R11.04 and R10.04

author: minfrin
msg: mod_cache: Ensure that we don't attempt to replace a cached response
with an older response as per RFC2616 13.12.
